title: Dana and Robin produce smoothies and pizza

content.question: Dana and Robin produce smoothies and pizza. In one hour Dana can make 20 smoothies or 10 pizzas. In one hour Robin can make 18 smoothies or 6 pizzas. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: Robin has an absolute advantage in making smoothies and a comparative advantage in making pizzas.
Robin has both an absolute advantage and a comparative advantage in making pizzas.
Dana has a comparative advantage in making both smoothies and pizzas.
Dana has a comparative advantage in making pizzas, and Robin has a comparative advantage in making smoothies.
Dana has a comparative advantage in making smoothies, and Robin has a comparative advantage in making pizzas.

content.answer: Dana has a comparative advantage in making pizzas, and Robin has a comparative advantage in making smoothies.
